articles.title: India and Canada to restore diplomatic services nearly two years after killing of Sikh separatist - AP News
articles.description: India and Canada have agreed to restore diplomatic services nearly two years after Ottawa accused New Delhi of alleged involvement in the killing of a Sikh separatist leader, which turned into a row straining relations between the two countries. The announcem…
